data.text: @thepinkstink @bachor @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua Found the info! It was Casey Van Loon from @ChicagoMosaic - see https://t.co/WZz0Lawzcl
@KevinIrvineChi @bachor @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua I didn't know anyone else was out there doing this. But it's not on the map on his website so possibly not?
@thepinkstink @bachor @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua Very cool! Is this a Jim @bachor creation? Doesn’t totally look like his style.
@KevinIrvineChi @Lily1129 @bachor @JJTindall1 @robertloerzel @KathleenMRooney @chouinardphoto @RogersParkMan @teidagua @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua Purell mosaic is my kind of art loll
@thepinkstink @bachor @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua I haven’t heard about that, but if you find it, let us know!
@KevinIrvineChi @bachor @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua Isn't there a Ruth Bader Ginsburg piece on Howard, east of the El, in front of the currency exchange? Anyone seen it? Not on the map

@KevinIrvineChi @bachor @JJTindall1 @robertloerzel @KathleenMRooney @chouinardphoto @RogersParkMan @teidagua @Sparrersway @emb_cit @giegerj @53viroqua I wondered about this! Thank you for posting the article link.
The 4th mosaic, Chicago’s six-pointed star, plus the mosaics lined up in one photo. https://t.co/vfndbvRst4
